CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers containing two different electron - deficient units ( DPP and TPD ) were synthesized to produce polymers with complementary and broad light absorption from 400 to 900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PBDTT - This is a material name, likely a type of random terpolymer.
2. DPP - This is another material name, likely a type of electron-deficient unit.
3. TPD - This is another material name, likely a type of electron-deficient unit.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PBDTT
2. DPP
3. TPD
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PBDTT
2. TPD

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PBDTT
2. TPD

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTT |
| TPD |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers containing two different electron - deficient units ( DPP and TPD ) were synthesized to produce polymers with complementary and broad light absorption from 400 to 900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's break down the paragraph and identify the entities related to "Property Value" in the context of the text:

1. "Property Value": In this context, "Property Value" refers to the range of wavelengths (or colors) of light that the synthesized polymers can absorb.
2. "400 to 900 nm": This is a specific range of wavelengths (or colors) of light that the polymers can absorb, which is mentioned in the paragraph as the "broad light absorption" of the polymers.
3. "Dpp and Tpd": These are the two different electron-deficient units (or building blocks) used in the synthesis of the random terpolymers. The presence of these units is what gives the polymers their complementary light absorption properties.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Broad light absorption (400 to 900 nm)
2. Dpp and Tpd (electron-deficient units used in the synthesis of the polymers)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to the "Value of Material Property" in the paragraph:

1. "400 to 900 nm": This is the range of wavelengths (or colors) of light that the synthesized polymers can absorb, which is the value of the material property of light absorption.
2. "Dpp and Tpd": These are the two different electron-deficient units (or building blocks) used in the synthesis of the polymers, which affect the material property of light absorption.

So, the relevant entities that refer to the "Value of Material Property" in the paragraph are:

1. "400 to 900 nm"
2. "Dpp and Tpd"

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to the "Value of Material Property" in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 400 to 900 nm |
| Dpp and Tpd |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
